function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study of BE attributes and their impact on COVID-19 spread.","Impact":"Lack of attention to BE attributes in pandemic policy measures.","Mitigation":"Increase focus on BE attributes in pandemic policy measures.","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools for studying BE attributes.","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, urban planners.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies."}]}
